channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Editor Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Editor Lite

item.title: CVE-2022-36867|2024-08-03T10:14:28.949Z -- samsung%20mobile -- editor%20lite
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Editor Lite prior to version 4.0.40.14 allows attackers to access sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2022-39891|2024-08-03T12:07:43.000Z -- samsung%20mobile -- editor%20lite
item.description: Heap overflow vulnerability in parse_pce function in libsavsaudio.so in Editor Lite prior to version 4.0.41.3 allows attacker to get information.
